summary: On her first day in Afghanistan, an interpreter for the US Army is forced to deliver the child of an enemy bomb-maker.
cast: Layla Alizada|Navid Negahban|Alexia Pearl|Bill Zasadil|Alain Ali Washnevsky|Yanellie Ireland|Shari Vasseghi|Mustafa Haidari|Jesse Luken|Ali Olomi|Dave Racki|Michael McCarthy
keywords: looking at oneself in a mirror|interpreter|afghanistan|u.s. army|afghan war
title: Day One
